mapper.select: select EI.emp_info_emp_no , EI.emp_info_name , EI.emp_info_phto , EI.emp_info_dept_code , EI.emp_info_job_code , EI.emp_info_email , EI.emp_info_mtel , EI.emp_info_etel , EI.emp_info_cmp_code , EI.emp_info_rm , rpad(substr(EI.emp_info_id_no,1,8), length(EI.emp_info_id_no), '*') as "emp_info_id_no" , EI.emp_info_gend , EI.emp_info_adr , EI.emp_info_emrg_tel , EI.emp_info_mrrg , EI.emp_info_acnt_no , EI.emp_info_bank_name , EI.emp_info_acnt_name , EI.emp_info_impd_type , EI.emp_info_impd_levl , EI.emp_info_vetr_no , EI.emp_info_vetr_rel , EI.emp_info_mils , to_char(EI.emp_info_edat, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as "emp_info_edat" , to_char(EI.emp_info_sdat, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as "emp_info_sdat" , DI.dept_info_name , JI.job_info_name from emp_info EI inner join dept_info DI on (EI.emp_info_dept_code = DI.dept_info_code) inner join job_info JI on (EI.emp_info_job_code = JI.job_info_code) and EI.emp_info_emp_no = #{emp_no}
